name: The Urban Warrior
raw_snippet: The Urban Warrior Full Padded Environmental Body Armor A light weight body armor that has been popular with adventurers and many city law enforcement officers for over a decade. This armor is a full body suit with special flexible padding and strategic placement of light metal plates. Usually comes in white, light grey, and tan colors. • M.D.C. 50 • Weight 11 pounds ( 5 kg) • Good mobility, — 10% prowl penalty. • Black market cost: 35,000 credits Juicer Assassin's Plate Armor This is the famous medium weight armor worn by the chemically augmented Juicer. • M.D.C. 45 • Weight 18 pounds ( 8 kg) • Good mobility, —5% prowl penalty. ' • Black market cost: 28,000 credits
